name: Timbersaw
title: Rizzrack
lore: Paranoid of trees, Rizzrack built a suit of armor to destroy every forest that threatens him.

whirlingDeath.name: Whirling Death
whirlingDeath.description: Spins rapidly, dealing damage and reducing the primary stat of enemies hit.

timberChain.name: Timber Chain
timberChain.description: Launches a chain that attaches to trees, pulling Timbersaw and damaging enemies in the path.

reactiveArmor.name: Reactive Armor
reactiveArmor.description: Each attack against Timbersaw grants bonus armor and health regen that stacks.

chakram.name: Chakram
chakram.description: Launches a spinning chakram that damages and slows enemies. Costs mana per second to maintain.

25: Whirling Death Grants +10 Strength per Hero Hit
